reviews.review: Great game but filled with cheaters
Objectively a good game. Problem remaining is that there is basically no anti-cheat and bad 64tick servers

Valve, your game is dogshit. You have lured me in with skins and a cool ui, but your game is still dogshit. You never update it, it is riddled with cheaters and smurfs, and the matchmaking system is so shitty that I have to go to 3rd party sites to play a "fair game". This game is valves money producer, the only game they actually update is dota.

Well, it's been 2 years since I've played this game on the regular, and I don't have much to say. It's a clean game. Valve has been surprisingly active with updates lately, which is nice. I still have plenty of friends enjoying themselves with this game and I'm happy to see that.
